summary.intent: Add a 'Re-run' button to the evaluation summary page that allows users to re-run evaluations without navigating back to the home page and re-entering the git URL.
summary.outcome: Successfully implemented re-run functionality with provider selection dropdown in non-cloud mode. All tests (1219), typecheck, and lint pass. Changes committed as f2635a5.

repo: The codebase uses tabs for indentation, not spaces
ProviderName type was being duplicated with inline union types that were missing 'codex' and 'random' options
PROVIDERS constant pattern from RepositoryUrlInput.tsx can be reused in other components
The cloudMode feature flag controls whether provider selection is shown vs. using 'random' provider

code.finding: handleUrlSubmit provider parameter was using inline union type instead of ProviderName, missing 'codex' and 'random' options
handleBatchSubmit had same provider type issue as handleUrlSubmit
Header action area needed to be wrapped in flex container to accommodate both re-run UI and delete button

workflow: Edit tool fails when whitespace (tabs vs spaces) doesn't match exactly - use Python script with file.replace() as fallback
Biome's lint:fix auto-formats code after manual edits, ensuring consistent style
Running tests, typecheck, and lint in sequence validates changes comprehensively before commit

friction: Multiple failed Edit tool attempts due to spaces vs tabs indentation mismatch
Had to resort to Python scripts with string replacement to handle tab-indented code
